name: League Bot
description: What is the project about? LeagueBot is a telegram bot designed for the betting passionate. What makes your project unique? LeagueBot is the first telegram bot for sport betting. Forget gas fee headaches(Pay in USDC) . 100% Decentralized experience. History of your project. No presale, no team reserved tokens. Liquidity locked for 1 yr. The project has been in progress for a couple of months and has just been launched. Whatâ€™s next for your project? An AI tool to assist you in determining the best place to make your bet. Analyze your bets and your emotions. Become the ultimate betting machine. Bet on world events, politics, and everything else. A stake pool for revenue sharing. What can your token be used for? Token can be used for revenue sharing.
